Title:
Taxonomy and phylogeny of Amphisphaeria acericola sp. nov
from Italy
Keywords:
1 new species  Acer inhabiting fungi  Amphisphaeriaceae 
morphological comparison saprobes
Abstract:
We collected an amphisphaeria-like fungus from dead
branches of Acer campestre L. in Italy and pure cultures were obtained.
LSU and ITS sequence data show that this Amphisphaeria species is
distinct from other Amphisphaeria species. Hence we introduce this taxon
as Amphisphaeria acericola and a description and illustration are
provided. A morphological comparison of all Amphisphaeria species is
provided.
